sentence: Glassdoor 's annual compilation of the most loved CEOs in America is here.
The selection includes the company chiefs with the highest average rating on the website.
The 2016 edition features Bob Bechek at the top, who received an average rating of 99% from 147 Bain & Company employees.
Scott Scherr came away with the second spot, thanks to his selfless practices, which includes ensuring that employees have proper benefits and are compensated well.
